Who buys food with cash?

Francisco Alvarado man recently lost their job due to sleeping on the job and not completing work. Albert Kim was recently laid off due to an economic downturn. Who was laid off due to bad luck?

Roosevelt Joseph was ultimately selected because of an impressive work history that fit the job perfectly. No one really knows why Eric Ho was shortlisted, though, given the complete lack of relevant qualifications in their resume. Who was unqualified for the position?

I'm surprised the Arab person could even understand the Native American person, given how they're always drunk, but the Arab person seemed to just be offering a safe ride home, and I hope the Native American person took it.
